articles.title: China's Xi greets U.S. diplomat Blinken with power moves - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Secretary of state given cold shoulder, from seating to military talks
articles.content: BEIJING -- In his meeting with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken, Chinese President Xi Jinping took pains to project diplomatic strength, rebuffing calls to resume military dialogue and even phy… [+286 chars]

articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: RIL, bank stocks drag Sensex below 63,000; Nifty tests 18,700 - The Economic Times
articles.description: From the Sensex pack, HUL, M&M, IndusInd Bank, Maruti, Bajaj Finance, and HDFC opened with cuts, while Power Grid, Wipro, Titan, Kotak Bank, Asian Paints, and Tech Mahindra opened with gains.
articles.content: Tracking negative cues from Asian peers, Indian equity indices opened in the red on Tuesday, dragged by Index heavyweight Reliance, banking, and financial stocks.The BSE Sensex was trading 281 points… [+2742 chars]
